choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [Boss's Name],
I regret to inform you that I will be leaving the company effective [date]. It has been a pleasure working with such a talented team, and I appreciate the opportunities provided to me during my time here. 
However, after careful consideration of personal and professional goals, it is time for me to pursue other opportunities in order to grow as a professional. While this decision is bittersweet, I am confident that this new path will lead to exciting and fulfilling experiences.
I would like to thank you and the entire team for your support throughout my tenure at [company name]. Your guidance and mentorship have been invaluable, and I hope to continue working with many of you in the future. 
Please let me know if there is anything else that I can do before leaving the company. Thank you again for everything.
Best regards,
[Your Name]
